players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I am suspicious of Charlie's sudden death and urge everyone to be cautious."
You: "I agree with Bob's concerns. Let us all be vigilant and keep an open dialogue as we move forward."
Diana: "'I agree with Bob's concerns and urge everyone to be cautious as well. Let's keep an open dialogue to ensure we make informed decisions.'..."

Bob: "I believe that Charlie's death was an unfortunate accident, but we must remain cautious and continue to communicate openly to ensure the safety of our community. It is important that we all trust each other during this investigation."

Diana: "I want to emphasize the importance of trust and communication in our investigation. Let us continue to share information openly and listen carefully to each other's concerns. We must all work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death and ensure the safety of our community..."
You: "I have faith in our ability to work together and uncover the truth behind Charlie's death. Let us continue to communicate openly and trust one another as we move forward in our investigation."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I am suspicious of Charlie's sudden death and urge everyone to be cautious."
Alice: "I agree with Bob's concerns. Let us all be vigilant and keep an open dialogue as we move forward."
You: "'I agree with Bob's concerns and urge everyone to be cautious as well. Let's keep an open dialogue to ensure we make informed decisions.'..."

Bob: "I believe that Charlie's death was an unfortunate accident, but we must remain cautious and continue to communicate openly to ensure the safety of our community. It is important that we all trust each other during this investigation."

You: "I want to emphasize the importance of trust and communication in our investigation. Let us continue to share information openly and listen carefully to each other's concerns. We must all work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death and ensure the safety of our community..."

Alice: "I have faith in our ability to work together and uncover the truth behind Charlie's death. Let us continue to communicate openly and trust one another as we move forward in our investigation."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Bob was arrested
